text: An indoor play structure, also known as a soft play area, is a form of children's play structure that is commonly used indoors. These play structures often feature slides, ball pits, and ziplines. They may be very large (Billy Beez in the Mall of Dhahran in Saudi Arabia), or very small (the Alpine Soft Play Village at We Are Vertigo - Newtownbreda). == References == Category:Children's entertainment
title: Soft play area
